item.title: Analyst: ETH Whale Group Absorbed All Market Selling Pressure in Last 30 Days, but Short-Term Long/Short Game May Intensify
item.description: On August 9th, on-chain data analyst Murphy posted data on social media, claiming that the current ETH on-chain structure is "very healthy" and is also showing a very clear trend of "de-retailization." In the past 30 days:· The Shark group (holding 100 to 1k ETH) has reduced its total holdings by 309k ETH.· The Whale group (holding 1k to 10k ETH) has reduced its total holdings by 698k ETH.· The Mega Whale group (holding 10k+ ETH) has increased its total holdings by 2.1m ETH.Murphy further stated that not only has the Mega Whale group's increased holdings fully covered the above two distribution-focused groups, but it has also absorbed chips sold by smaller fish and shrimp groups. Currently, there are still no signs of a significant reduction in the large volume of chips stacked in the $2,500-$2,800 range. With more and more traditional capital entering the market, if this trend of Mega Whale chip absorption continues, ETH is bullish in the medium to long term.However, for invest

item.title: [Quad ETH Whale with 75% Win Rate] Liquidated Today, Lost $20.73M Shorting ETH for 11 Days
item.description: On August 9th, according to the monitoring of on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, the [Four-time ETH Short Whale with a 75% Win Rate] had its position liquidated again this afternoon. Instead of continuing to add to the position, it chose to close it completely. This address suffered a loss of $20.73 million from this shorting activity.It is reported that this address started shorting ETH on July 28th and had a floating profit of $12.25 million on August 3rd. However, as ETH kept rising, its position kept getting liquidated, resulting in an additional funding of $20.98 million.Ultimately, this afternoon, the address admitted defeat, closed the entire position, and had $0.25 million remaining.

item.title: Ark of Panda has announced the completion of a $4.5 million financing round and the launch of an ecosystem partner recruitment plan.
item.description: August 9th: According to official information, Ark of Panda has declared the accomplishment of a financing round amounting to $4.5 million. This round of financing was guided by Ember Labs, Wabi Sabi Trading, CoreX Venture, and over 20 other institutions.Ark of Panda has also announced the initiation of an ecosystem partner recruitment plan, which is intended to jointly establish the Web3 Innovation Center. The platform has begun to recruit ecosystem partners, inviting various projects to participate. By leveraging precise traffic and user engagement, it aims to support and incubate high-quality Web3 projects.This partnership plan encompasses daily task promotion, multi-token integration, AI smart body personalized services, and virtual asset trading. It provides partners with exposure opportunities, shared user traffic, and AI-UGC technical support, enabling them to gain a competitive edge in the Web3 field. Through built-in access and joint marketing, this plan will promote effic

item.title: LD Capital Founder James: The next target for ETH is the $5000 ATH. It is expected that the upcoming halving expectations will usher in the Season of Quality Altcoins.
item.description: On August 9th, the founder of LD Capital, E Li Hua (Chris Li), stated on social media that after ETH broke through the $4000 double top resistance level, the new target is to break through the new high of $5000 and catch up to the exchange rate of BTC at $10,000. Certainly, the uptrend will not go in a straight line. He emphasized adhering to the bull market trend and the buy-the-dip strategy, and noted that the upcoming expectations of rate cuts will bring about the altcoin season.Subsequently, Ethereum's rise reached $4200. E Li Hua (Chris Li) stated that this kind of performance is in line with the bull markets of 2017 and 2020. Only ETH can bring investors back to the bull market. Holding onto ETH and avoiding shorting it will not cause investors to miss this bull market cycle.

item.title: In the past 1 hour, an Ethereum smart contract transaction liquidated $114 million, with the largest short liquidation reaching $112 million.
item.description: On August 9th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 1 hour, a total of $138 million was liquidated across the entire network. The amount of long liquidations was $5.03 million and the amount of short liquidations was $133 million. Among them, the amount liquidated in Ethereum contract trades reached $114 million, with $1.73 million in long liquidations and $112 million in short liquidations.

item.title: Ethereum Fork Coins Surge Across the Board, ENA, EIGEN, OP Up Over 10%
item.description: On August 9th, based on HTX market data, as Ethereum rose to reach $4200, Ethereum-based meme coins generally showed an upward trend in the market, including:SSV increased by 13.24% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $10.09.ENA rose by 12.46% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.6954.EIGEN rose by 11.88% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.413.PEPE increased by 11.45% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.00001226.OP rose by 10.4% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.797.COW rose by 10.14% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.4082.ETC rose by 10.1% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $23.58.COMP rose by 10% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $52.28.UNI rose by 9.2% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $11.37.

item.title: WORLD3 has released a demo video showcasing Web3 Automation.
item.description: On August 9th, the Web3-native AI Intelligent Agent platform WORLD3 released a 4-minute demo video on its official Twitter, presenting its "Long-lived Expert Agent" and how it realizes a fully automated process from conception to product launch. The full video has been uploaded to YouTube.The video demonstrated the "Agent Collaboration Workflow". Users only need to put forward a concept (such as decentralized VPN), and multiple AI agents can collaborate to complete tasks like writing whitepapers, generating code, creating websites, and promoting on social media.Furthermore, WORLD3 showcased the applications of AI agents in different scenarios, including assisting Web3 beginners in deploying one-click automated mining game agents. These agents are based on the cloud-native WORLD VM architecture and are capable of executing complex tasks 24/7 and understanding on-chain reality.

item.title: SOL/ETH exchange rate drops to 0.043, down over 50% from April peak
item.description: On August 9th, based on HTX market data, with ETH rising to touch $4200 and returning to the range of historical highs, the SOL/ETH exchange rate dropped to 0.043. Since reaching a high of 0.0886 on April 22nd, it has been in a downtrend for 109 days, with a decrease of 51.63%.

item.title: ETH/BTC Exchange Rate Rebounds to 0.036, Surging Over 100% from April Low
item.description: On August 9th, based on HTX market data, with ETH rising to reach $4200 and returning to the historical high range, the ETH/BTC exchange rate rebounded to touch 0.036, showing a 103.7% increase from the low point in April.

item.title: Trader Eugene: Ethereum Successfully Breaks $4,000 Resistance Level, Goes Long
item.description: On August 9th, Trader Eugene Ng Ah Sio posted in his personal channel, "There isn't much to express. The $4000 resistance level has been breached, so I yield and have switched to a long position. Now, I am merely awaiting Tom Lee (the newly appointed Chairman of BitMine, a prominent figure in ETH long positions) to lead us to the promised land."
